data.text: @HawkeyeFan1983 @natashablue22 Russian petroleum makes up less than 1% of the US annual petroleum consumption. You are an idiot. You don't know anything. This isn't an insult, it is the truth. Please stop pretending that you understand things.

@natashablue22 No, they're "asking" me to submit my inalienable human rights to a provisional dictatorship. They are "asking" every human being on the planet to have invasive medical procedures done on political grounds. This is much more insidious than any mere war.
